name: Fun Chess Puzzles Pro
description:
Do you want to have fun learning chess? Download this addictive chess puzzle app and improve your chess skills today!

Fun Chess Puzzles Pro has a collection of more than 4000 carefully selected chess puzzles (chess tactics), which range from simple to extremely difficult.
The solution of a puzzle is the sequence of best moves to be played from the given position.
A puzzle is considered solved only if all the moves in the solution are played in the correct order.
Your rating is updated with each puzzle played. If you solve a puzzle, your rating increases, whereas if you fail to solve a puzzle your rating decreases. Puzzles displayed in the app are based on your current skill level.
The rating is updated according to the Glicko-2 rating system, invented by Mark Glickman.
The chess tactics include a wide variety of tactical motifs: checkmate, blocking, interference, pin, discovered attack, clearance, trapped piece, sacrifice, skewer, overloaded piece, advanced pawn, mate threat, removing the defender, X-ray attack, weak back rank, zugzwang, zwischenzug, perpetual and stalemate.

Featuring:
• Intuitive user interface
• More than 4000 offline puzzles, which range from 1000 ELO to 2500 ELO.
• Support for tablets
• Several chess themes
• ELO calculation (Glicko-2 rating system)
• ELO history tracking
• Share puzzles with your friends via Facebook, WhatsApp, email, and more.
• Chess notation for moves
• Next puzzle selection based on your current ELO
• ELO reset
• Report invalid puzzles
• Strong chess engine analysis
• Statistics for completed tactics
• Analyze your Chess App Integration
• Achievements and Leaderboard

Keywords: Stockfish 10 chess engine, FEN, chess tactic, chess problem, chess position, chess solution, best move, chess notation, tactic viewer, chess trainer, chess training, puzzles trainer, share tactic, chess position analysis.

Fun Chess Puzzles Free, the free version of Fun Chess Puzzles Pro, is available at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lucian.musca.chess.puzzle&hl=en.

Free vs Pro version
• Pro version does not contain ads
• Pro version contains all the features of the Free version
• Pro version has German, Spanish language support.

Permissions
Internet permission - is used for Report Invalid Puzzle functionality and analytics.
Storage permission - is used for ELO tracking, Statistics, chess engine installation and chess engine analysis.
Vibration permission - to provide audio notifications during game.
